recipesJson.name: Ruyan Twist
recipesJson.author: SeanVapes
recipesJson.description:
A really good dessert tobacco
Smooth and creamy custard ( WF Vanilla Ruyan Custard / VT Vanilla Cream ) with a touch of tobacco ( TPA RY4 Double ) . This is infused with a sweet backnote from the pear combination ( MB Shape Up Pear / FA Pear ) with added freshness from the FA Fuji Apple . Sweetener is optional to personal taste .

I really hope you can give this a try .
